patch 8.1.0526: running out of signal stack in RealWaitForChar

Problem:    Running out of signal stack in RealWaitForChar. (Vladimir Marek)
Solution:   Make the fd_set variables static.

attachments.text:
patch 8.1.0526: running out of signal stack in RealWaitForChar

Problem:    Running out of signal stack in RealWaitForChar. (Vladimir Marek)
Solution:   Make the fd_set variables static.
